com.github.zaphx.discordbot.api.commandhandler

Interface CommandListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountLink, AccountUnlink, AdAllow, Event, Help, MapMessages, Mute, Warn, WhoIs

    public interface CommandListener
    This is the command listener interface that makes a class an executable command.

    • Method Detail

      • onCommand

        CommandExitCode onCommand(sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IUser sender,
                          String command,
                          List<String> args,
                          sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IChannel destination,
                          sx.blah.discord.handle.impl.events.guild.channel.message.MessageReceivedEvent event)
        The method used whenever a command is executed. This will automatically be called when a command is executed. It will return a CommandExitCode based on how the command was exited.
        Parameters:
        sender - The command sender.
        command - The command used.
        args - The arguments provided by the sender.
        destination - The channel the message should be sent to. By default this is the channel the command was received in.
        event - The event provided by discord.
        Returns:
        This method will return a CommandExitCode showing how the command was exited.

      • getCommandDescription

        @NotNull
@NotNull String getCommandDescription()
        Used to generate the help message, when the help command is run on the command.
        Returns:
        Returns the help message of the provided command.

      • getCommandUsage

        @NotNull
@NotNull String getCommandUsage()
        Used to generate the usage message in the help embed, when the help command is run on the command.
        Returns:
        Returns the usage message of the provided command.
